hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Abdullah bin 'Umar that 'Umar said:"O Messenger of Allah! May any one of us sleep while he is Junub?" He said: "When he performs Wudu

chapter.ara-name: باب وُضُوءِ الْجُنُبِ إِذَا أَرَادَ أَنْ يَنَامَ
chapter.eng-name: The Junub Person Performing Wudu' When He Wants To Sleep
